00041 /**
00042  * @brief IntensityMart object for reading intensity files for text,
00043  * useful for testing via text files.
00044  */
00045 class TableReader : public IntensityReader {
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00049   /** 
00050    * @brief Constructor
00051    * @param clfProbeCount - Number of probes in file.
00052    * @param columnHeaderNames - Does the table have column header names to be read.
00053    */
00054   TableReader(int clfProbeCount, bool columnHeaderNames=false) : 
00055     m_ClfProbeCount(clfProbeCount), m_RowColNames(columnHeaderNames), m_Read(false), m_Passed(false) {}
00056 
00057   /** 
00058    * @brief Read the file that contains the intensity data.
00059    * @return true if opened sucessfully, false otherwise.
00060    */
00061   bool readFiles();
00062 
00063 private: 
00064   /// How many probes 
00065   int m_ClfProbeCount;
00066   /// Are ther row and column names?
00067   bool m_RowColNames;
00068   /// Are we done reading
00069   bool m_Read;
00070   /// Are we done initializing stream
00071   bool m_Passed;
00072 };
00073 
00074 #endif /* _TABLEREADER_H_ */
